item.description:
MV911T members will offer free books to people who answer 3 out of 5 questions quiz correctly.

 

The video from past event can be watched here

http://youtu.be/Y8bAnJkx6fo

http://youtu.be/F_E_-V_BOmM

 

For others, we will have literature regarding the Federal Reserve, Fluoride and Vaccine awareness, TSA and will give away 50+ loose change dvd's, Zero-an investigation into 911 and other truth material.

 

We will be video recording the event!

 

The event hosts are new members Goshe and Chuck. Please join them to start a new kind of activism for our group.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a sign that reads "win a book", a Table Setup with Books, DVD's etc., in front of the capital building on Main Street.
item.name: Monthly - Win a book, Street Activism
